feature_model.name: Trim
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Trim (f_Trim) :m Antenna (f_Antenna) :m InteriorColor (f_InteriorColor) :m Sienna (f_Sienna) :m PsgrCount (f_PsgrCount) :m Engine (f_Engine) :m Drive (f_Drive) :m Grade (f_Grade) :m Derived (f_Derived) :m ExteriorColor (f_ExteriorColor) :m Color (f_Color) :m ModelCode (f_ModelCode) :o Accessories (f_Accessories) :o Mud Flaps (f_Mud_Flaps) :o Floor Mats (f_Floor_Mats) :g [1, 1] : V6 (f_V6) : L4 (f_L4) :g [1, 1] : SE (f_SE) : LE (f_LE) : Base (f_Base) : XLE (f_XLE) : LTD (f_LTD) :g [1, 1] : Charcoal (f_Charcoal) : Bisc (f_Bisc) : Gray (f_Gray) :g [1, 1] : 5312 (f_5312) : 5328 (f_5328) :g [1, 1] : 2Wd (f_2Wd) : AWD (f_AWD) :g [1, 1] : 7PSGR (f_7PSGR) : 8PSGR (f_8PSGR) :g [1, 1] : Super White (f_Super_White) : Blizzard Pearl (f_Blizzard_Pearl) : Silver Sky Metallic (f_Silver_Sky_Metallic) :g [1, 1] : Pole (f_Pole) : In Glass (f_In_Glass) :o XLE Premium Package (f_XLE_Premium_Package) :o XLE Navigation Package (f_XLE_Navigation_Package)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_In_Glass or f_5328 constraint_2:~f_SE or f_Pole constraint_3:~f_SE or f_5328 constraint_4:~f_5312 or f_Pole constraint_5:~f_5312 or f_Base constraint_6:~f_LE or f_Pole constraint_7:~f_LE or f_5328 constraint_8:~f_Base or f_Pole constraint_9:~f_Charcoal or f_Pole constraint_10:~f_Charcoal or f_SE constraint_11:~f_LTD or f_In_Glass constraint_12:~f_LTD or f_5328 constraint_13:~f_XLE_Premium_Package or f_XLE constraint_14:~f_XLE_Navigation_Package or f_XLE constraint_15:~f_XLE or f_5328
